original_text: Now Tobiah the Ammonite was by him, and he said, Even that which they build, if a fox go up, he shall even break down their stone wall.
korean_text: 암몬 사람 도비야는 곁에 있다가 이르되 그들이 건축하는 돌 성벽은 여우가 올라가도 곧 무너지리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Now Tobiah the Ammonite was by him
sentences.korean_translation: 때에 암몬 사람 도비아가 그 곁에 있었는데

sentences.original_text: he shall even break down their stone wall
